ComicInfo.Title: Wanted: Hitler Dead or Alive
ComicInfo.Series: DC Horror Presents: Sgt. Rock vs. the Army of the Dead
ComicInfo.Summary:
They've blasted their way through impossible scenarios and burned their way through throngs of undead soldiers.
But now Sgt. Rock and Easy Company find themselves hot on the trail of an enemy even they may not be able to handle: an über-upgraded, rejuvenation serum-addicted Adolf Hitler.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-15 19:31:17. [CVDB965829]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Ben Templesmith, Brad Anderson, Francesco Francavilla, Gary Frank
ComicInfo.Editor: Alex Galer, Ben Meares, Katie Kubert
ComicInfo.Characters: Adolf Hitler, Bulldozer, Eva Braun, Four-Eyes, Little Sure Shot, Sgt. Rock
ComicInfo.Teams: Easy Company, Nazis, United States Army, Zombies
